data.system_settings: iPhone 6s with iOS 11.0.3 & iPad Air 2 with iOS 11.1 PB 5
data.actual_result: Right after clicking it Discord crashes.
data.expected_result: You should get an error message that Discord doesn't have permission to your photos app (like for uploading photos).
data.short_description: Discord crashes when trying to save image without access to the photos app [Might be iOS 11 only]
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to your iOS settings and disallow Discord access to the photos app - Open Discord again and search for an image/gif - Click on this image to open image preview - Click again on this image to open the buttons - Now click on the 3 dots - Try to save the image.
